name.ja: ウェブサイトQRコード生成

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes for websites with their favicons as center icons
short.ja: ファビコン付きQRコードを生成
short.zh_CN: 生成带有网站图标的二维码

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website QR Code Generator instantly creates QR codes with website favicons as center icons. Perfect for sharing web content across devices. Features elegant Disney-inspired design, multi-language support, and offline operation. No data collection, completely private.
long.ja: Display QR code for current webpage in the bottom right corner
